NewFile¶

ere blah

Set of tools that will come in handy when dealing with SQL databases and Qt applications

database_viewer.table_tools.tools.get_headings(db, query)[source]¶

get the headings from a table in the specified database

Takes a reference to a database, and a string for which table you want to query, returns the headers.

MySQL database syntax.

Parameters:
  • db – A MySQLdb.connect.
  • query – A string which contains the query to be executed
database_viewer.table_tools.tools.itersql(db, query)[source]¶

Yields a row of data from the query

Used to iterate over query rather than querying then assigning, then looping over that data.

Parameters:
  • db – A MySQLdb.connect.
  • query – A string which contains the query to be executed
Returns:

Yields a row from the database.
database_viewer.table_tools.tools.sql_query(*args, **kwds)[source]¶

Ability to use a set of sql results within a with statement.

Parameters:
  • db – A MySQLdb.connect.
  • query – A string which contains the query to be executed
database_viewer.table_tools.tools.to_unicode(string, encoding='utf-8')[source]¶

Returns a string in the specified encoding, default is utf-8

Parameters:
  • string – string which needs to be converted
  • encoding – string which is a encoding type.
